title: Choosing Your Marriage Partner

abstract: Will Joe choose his ideal marriage partner?
description: A dramatised story of a young man who is trying to decide which of two young women would make the better wife!?! Several important factors in selecting a marriage partner are illustrated; emotional maturity, family background, harmony of personality, philosophy of life and common interests. Note: Made in 1952.
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MOV file H264; ACMI Digital Access Copy - presentation
